title: Fall Teacher Open House
short_description: Gather resources for your classroom, find out about learning experiences for your students, and explore the museum’s Arts of the Americas galleries in our fall open house.
list_description: Gather resources for your classroom, find out about learning experiences for your students, and explore the museum’s Arts of the Americas galleries in our fall open house.
description:
Educators are invited to join this year's fall open house at the Art Institute of Chicago. Get creative with peers, enjoy free refreshments, and gather resources for your classroom, including posters, image sets, and lesson plans that support the integration of art across subjects.

Plus, learn about updated learning experiences for students, educators, and families, explore the museum’s Arts of the Americas galleries, and stop by the recently refreshed Ryan Learning Center.

The Fall Teacher Open House is made possible through the generous support of the Terra Foundation for American Art.
